fields.name: Step by step guide:
fields.value:
1. Select a role (see available roles below)
2. Write the command '!iam' in the messagebox
3. Add an empty space followed by your role

fields.name: Available Roles (https://lnk.armaldio.xyz/cc_roles):
fields.value: expert, dev, artist, gamedesigner, sounddesigner, multimediadev
